column6: Sin and Crossbones attempt to crack the undersea vault of the Sub-Marine to retrieve one of The Serpent's hammers. Guest-starring the Thing and the FF, Namor the Sub-Mariner, the Thunderbolts and more!
column8: | artist:Art Adams | artist:Mark Bagley | artist:Paul Pelletier | writer:Cullen Bunn | writer:Matt Fraction | writer:Chris Yost
